abstract: GlaxoSmithKline and Pfizer plan to spin out and combine their H.I.V. research units, choosing an alternative to the big mergers that have been transforming the industry.
snippet: GlaxoSmithKline and Pfizer plan to spin out and combine their H.I.V. research units, choosing an alternative to the big mergers that have been transforming the industry.
lead_paragraph: The rapid consolidation in the pharmaceutical industry continued Thursday as GlaxoSmithKline and Pfizer, two rival drug makers, agreed to spin out and combine their H.I.V. research units into a new company.

headline.main: A Different Kind of Drug Deal
